name: VersionAssemblies
description: Updates the version number of the assemblies to match the build number
author: Colin Dembovsky (colinsalmcorner.com)

inputs.name: sourcePath
inputs.label: Source Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path in which to search for version files (like AssemblyInfo.* files). Leave empty to use the sources directory. NOTE: this is case sensitive for non-Windows systems.

inputs.name: filePattern
inputs.label: File Pattern
inputs.helpMarkDown: File filter to replace version info. The version number pattern should exist somewhere in the file(s). Supports minimatch. NOTE: this is case sensitive for non-Windows systems.

inputs.name: versionSource
inputs.label: Version Source
inputs.helpMarkDown: The source for the version number. Defaults to the build number, but can be a build variable.

inputs.name: customNumberVariable
inputs.label: Variable to use
inputs.helpMarkDown: Variable to use for the version number. Do not specify $() - just enter the name.

inputs.name: versionFormat
inputs.label: Version Extract Pattern
inputs.helpMarkDown: Pattern to use to extract the build number as well as default replacement pattern.

inputs.name: customBuildRegex
inputs.label: Custom Regex Find Pattern
inputs.helpMarkDown: Regular Expression to extract version from build number. This is also the default replace regex (unless otherwise specified in Advanced settings).

inputs.name: replaceVersionFormat
inputs.label: Replace Pattern
inputs.helpMarkDown: Pattern to use to replace the version in the files.

inputs.name: customReplaceRegex
inputs.label: Custom Regex Replace Pattern
inputs.helpMarkDown: Regular Expression to replace with in files.

inputs.name: buildRegexIndex
inputs.label: Build Regex Group Index
inputs.helpMarkDown: Index of group in build regular expression that you want to use as the version number. Leave as 0 if you have no groups.

inputs.name: replacePrefix
inputs.label: Prefix for Replacements
inputs.helpMarkDown: String to prefix the regex replacement with.

inputs.name: replacePostfix
inputs.label: Postfix for Replacements
inputs.helpMarkDown: String to postfix the regex replacement with.

inputs.name: failIfNoMatchFound
inputs.label: Fail If No Target Match Found
inputs.helpMarkDown: Fail the build if no match is found for the replace regex in the target file(s).
